data.title: Closed
data.text: This venue has been closed. It used to be a good venue but the owner and the City of Mansfiels had some misunderstandings and it has been closed for music venues. It's now the Mansfield Arts Association building.

data.title: BYOB- $20 ticket, no fee for parking, and a soft-sided cooler of beer- you can't beat it.
data.text: Cool little theatre. Great venue for whatever band shows up. I've been 4-5 times now and it doesn't matter who it is, it's cool to be in a small venue. The added bonus is BYOB- $20 ticket, no fee for parking, and a soft-sided cooler of beer- you can't beat it.

data.title: Historic, intimate theatre.
data.text: An experience not to be missed. This historic theatre in downtown Mansfield is a gem that everyone should experience. They regularly hold community events such as talent showcases, classic movie night and regional music talent. The atmosphere and ambience of this theatre cannot be matched.  Check their website regularly and treat yourself to an experience. You will fall in love with this little theatre and want to go back again and again.
